sentences: Jeff Hamilton (born August 4, 1953) is an American jazz drummer and co-leader of the Clayton-Hamilton Jazz Orchestra.
Hamilton was born in Richmond, Indiana, United States, and attended Indiana University.
Starting in 1975, he was a member of Monty Alexander's Trio, then Woody Herman's Orchestra from 1977 until 1978.
1979 Rosemary Clooney Sings the Lyrics of Ira Gershwin
1996 Prelude to a Kiss: The Duke Ellington Album, Dee Dee Bridgewater
2012 Kisses on the Bottom, Paul McCartney
